item.title: Who would you pick..?
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:26, topic:85455”][quote author=JV link=topic=125247.msg1226196#msg1226196 date=1177726116]
I think there’s alot of people who would be good mods. Yet I don’t believe we really need one.
Yes I’m new, well sort of. I’ve been using TuT’s, and looking at sigs for months, but I’ve only just started to contribute
I remember the good old days when I was 12, and I used these forums under a different name, and Mr.Chris was a mod. I sucked at graphics big timee, but I used alot of advice from several ex-members, and several members who’re still active here :D, and I hope to keep learning alot from you guyss.

[/quote]

I do remember your name, actually. Not you personally though. Welcome back You’ll learn a lot from FastBawlz…I envy him sometimes <3[/quote]

Ahh, Thanks man. I’m glad we don’t have a mod at this moment in timee, because this little conversation Ive just started is more commonly known as spam. ^_~
And I remember FastBawlz from the old days, he was a proper noob haha, It’s nice to see how much he’s improved. I wish I’d put more of my time into graphics, rather than learning java and html and the likes, I hope I become more active in this section.
I’ll probably be posting some of my gcse graphics coursework up here pretty soon, it’s sweet.

Read full topic

I remember the good old days when I was 12, and I used these forums under a different name, and Mr.Chris was a mod. I sucked at graphics big timee, but I used alot of advice from several ex-members, and several members who’re still active here :D, and I hope to keep learning alot from you guyss.[/quote]

item.title: Who would you pick..?
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:18, topic:85455”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=125247.msg1223689#msg1223689 date=1177676350]

Who hee is actually active? Who ever is most active should be a mod if they understand graphical things, such as the complexity of the pieces of work, and not just thinking it looks pretty.

I personally think it should be based on ‘Does the person know how to mod?’ not ‘If the post a lot they get it’.
[/quote]
So your saying we should choose a good mod, but he doesn’t have to be active?[/quote]
We need a mod, there is alot of spam going on in these forums, that could be deleted. People who are active, and know what they are doing, deserve modship.

Read full topic
